channel.title: Correctly adding items to server?
channel.description:
I tried adding an item to a server using one of the tutorials on this forum, it doesn't work.
When I add the item to the item.cfg file and then use the (for example)
::pickup XXXX 1
It closes my server then i have to log in again.
How do i [b][i]CORRECTLY[/i][/b] add items to my server?

item.title: Correctly adding items to server?
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Add it to Item.cfg. Then if you want it to go into the correct spot at the ID to your Item.java and Item4.java.

Read full topic
